title: Become A Developer In The Crypto World
blog: More and more you hear about crypto currencies. With them becoming the future, it might be a good idea to start becoming a developer for crypto as there will ba a lot of potential opportunities.

title: iPhone 13 Camera
blog: With the new iPhones coming out in September 2021, the camera for them has been leaked.

title: WHen will graphics be easy to get?
blog: Ever since the release of Nvidia's new graphics cards in 2020, they have been almost impossible to get. This is mainly due to the silicone shortage, which was caused by the pandemic.

title: Will more big companies change their websites to Shopify?
blog: More and more companies are changing their websites over to Shopify. It would be very interesting to see a company like Footlocker or Adidas do this.
